inclusion.criterion: operable breast cancer diagnosed by histopathology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: disposed to practice contraception during the whole trial
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT and AST ≤ 2.5 times of normal upper limit
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: TBIL ≤ 1.5 times of normal upper limit
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine ≤ 1.5 times of normal upper limit
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: other cancers at the same time or have the history of other cancers in recent five years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant or lactational, or patients refuse to practice contraception during the whole trial
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: special conditions that they can't understand the written informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: allergic history of the chemotherapeutic agents
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer. She has no distant metastasis and normal cardiac functions by echocardiography. However, she smokes frequently and consumes alcohol occasionally.
